meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>thanks</kanji> <kanji>ceremony</kanji> is the dance you do in life when it comes to your <vocabulary>manners</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>courtesy</vocabulary> to others. Also means <vocabulary>etiquette</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
